name: Table Rate Shipping for WooCommerce
author: JEM Plugins

sections.description:
Fully customizable Table Rate Shipping (conditional shipping) plugin for WooCommerce – look no further this is the rate shipping plugin that you need! An easy to use plugin that will provide your WooCommerce site with table rate shipping aka tiered shipping or conditional shipping.

Rate shipping can be configured based on shipping weight and total shipping price (with min and max). Additional shipping rates can be created using standard WooCommerce shipping settings.

Take a look at the video and to see just how easy it is to set table rate shipping;

It is super-easy to add to your WooCommerce store and set up shipping rules.

Key Features

  • Seamless integration with WooCommerce shipping zones
  • Easy to use – very intuitive user interface
  • Define the shipping label that shows up in the cart for the buyer
  • Define Shipping by Total Cost
  • Define Shipping by Weight
  • Include or exclude Tax
  • You can set up multiple tiers – effective for most stores
  • Add additional handling fees for each order

Pro Version Features

>

Some stores need more features, so we created a Pro version which is a lot more powerful.

  • Set up unlimited shipping services e.g. Standard Shipping, Express Shipping
  • Shipping can be driven by Country, State or Zip/Postal Code
  • Use WooCommerce built-in Shipping Classes allowing for complex rules
  • Base shipping on the number of items in the cart
  • Calculate shipping based on the weight of items (lbs or kg, imperial or metric)
  • Include a handling fee in your shipping costs
  • Provides amazing flexibility for your store
  • Fanatical Support
  • …and much more

See what pro offers

Questions?

If you have any questions please feel free to post them to the support forum.
sections.installation:
1. Upload woocommerce-easy-table-rate-shipping.zip to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
sections.faq:
How do I specify no upper limit on the max rate?

Simply use the ‘*’ (asterisk) in the ‘Max’ field and the plugin will interpret that as infinite.

What countries & currencies are supported?

We support ALL WooCommerce countries and currencies. If it is in WooCommerce, then we have it covered!

What if I want some changes?

Contact us here and let us know what you need!

What if I need some help?

Contact us here we are always happy to help!

How can I report security bugs?

You can report security bugs through the Patchstack Vulnerability Disclosure Program. The Patchstack team help validate, triage and handle any security vulnerabilities. Report a security vulnerability.

short_description: Advanced shipping rate for WooCommerce. Calculate rate shipping using country, weight, or price. Supports WooCommerce shipping zones.

upgrade_notice.2.0.0: This is a MAJOR upgrade and you will need to setup your shipping using WooCommerce Shipping Zones - do not proceed unless you are ready and able to do that.
